Apple Inc. is an American Corporation that produces personal and tablet computers, audio players, phones, and software.it owns the Apple Pay payment service. A 7-to-1 split of the shares allowed them to join the Dow Jones index in March 2015. The company has a generous policy towards its shareholders: in addition to paying dividends, buyback programs are also regularly implemented.
Bilibili is a video sharing website dedicated to animation, comics, and games based in China, where users can send, view, and add comments to the subtitles of the videos.

Gazprom is the largest gas company in the world, holding a leading position in the market of gas production, transportation and sales in Russia and abroad. The main sales market of the company is the Russian Federation. The second place is occupied by Europe, which accounts for about a third of the total volume of deliveries. The company is also engaged in oil production and refining. Gazprom\'s main shareholder is the state, and its share in the holding\'s share capital is 50.2%. At the moment, it is the largest Russian company by market capitalization.

VTB is the second largest Russian commercial bank by assets after Sberbank.It was founded in 1990 as the Bank for Foreign Trade, abbreviated as Vneshtorgbank. After the transformation of Vneshtorgbank into an open joint stock company in 1998, almost all the shares (96.8 %) of the credit institution belonged to the state represented by the Central Bank, but four years later the shares were transferred to the Federal Agency for State Property Management.

LUKOIL is one of the world\'s largest private oil and gas companies. LUKOIL\'s main areas of activity are oil and gas production and processing. Most of the company\'s hydrocarbon reserves are located in the fields in Western Siberia. LUKOIL plays a leading role in the global market for the production of petroleum products and petrochemicals, supplying its products to 27 countries around the world. In addition, the company has oil refineries and a network of gas stations in Russia and the United States.

Evraz plc (Evraz, Evraz Group) is an international vertically integrated metallurgical and mining company with assets in the Russian Federation, the United States, Canada, the Czech Republic, Italy, and Kazakhstan. Its headquarters are in London. It is one of the largest steel producers in the world. Its own base of iron ore and coking coal almost completely meets the internal needs of EVRAZ. The company is included in the leading index of the London Stock Exchange FTSE-100. EVRAZ unites about 80,000 employees worldwide.

Bulltrade ltd. is an Company in London England, created Bulltrade APP and BULLCOIN BCN for a new generation of trader. More fun and more features for user. BULLCOIN is a new currency on market of crypto with potential of high performance!

Bitcoin, or bitcoin (from the English Bitcoin, from bit-bit and coin-coin) — is a peer-to-peer payment system that uses the unit of the same name to account for transactions. Cryptographic methods are used to ensure the functioning and protection of the system, but all information about transactions between the addresses of the system is available in plain text.

Ethereum (Ethereum, from the English ether [iiːθə] - \"ether\") is a cryptocurrency and a platform for creating decentralized online services based on the blockchain (decentralized applications), working on the basis of smart contracts. Implemented as a single decentralized virtual machine. The concept was proposed by the founder of Bitcoin Magazine Vitalik Buterin at the end of 2013, the network was launched on July 30, 2015.

Litecoin (LTC or Ł) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open-source software project released under the MIT/X11 license. Litecoin was an early bitcoin spinoff or altcoin, starting in October 2011. In technical details, Litecoin is nearly identical to Bitcoin.

string-array.name: posts
string-array.item: Today good day to invest in some company.
Russia resumes international flights from three more cities.

resources.string: JD.com -Chinese online hypermarket, the main competitor of AliExpress. On JD.com they buy household goods, cosmetics and perfumes, clothing, shoes, accessories and electronics. See also JD.com Invests in European online stores: in June 2017, the company invested $ 397 million in the online luxury clothing boutique Farfetch.The company is included in the Fortune Global 500-the rating of the largest corporations in the world according to the magazine of the same name. In 2016, revenue JD.com They were larger than those of Alibaba, the company that owns AliExpress and Taobao. In 2017 JD.com 236.5 million people use it.

Sohu, Inc (Chinese: 搜狐; pinyin: Souhu; literally: \"Search-fox\") is a Chinese internet company that offers advertising, a search engine, online multiplayer games, and more. Provides a Web 2.0-based network to millions of Chinese users every day. The headquarters is located Sohu Internet Plaza in Haidian district, Beijing. Sohu was ranked as the third and twelfth fastest growing company in the world by Fortune in 2009 and 2010, respectively. Sohu Subsidiary Changyou.com has a diverse portfolio of online games, including Tian Long Ba Bu, a massively multiplayer online game in China, and DDTank and Wartune (also known as Shen Qu), these games are the two most popular web games in China.
